ygData.subject: Meet the musical brothers!
ygData.msgSnippet: Composer/Symphony/Orchestra Three pods enter the Earth s atmosphere, going in different directions.  One lands three miles off the destroyed coast of Spain.

Composer/Symphony/Orchestra

       Three pods enter the Earth's atmosphere=
, going in different directions.  One lands three miles off the destroyed c=
oast of Spain.  One lands in about southwest Africa.  The last one lands in=
 probably the oddest place to land:inside of a volcano located in Greece.

=
        --Near the base(s) of the Alliance--

      A pod crashes on the gr=
ound, fortunately(for the Alliance, hehehe) the pod takes minor damage.  It=
 then opened up, and out came a very bold, sleek-looking bot, who is known =
as Composer.  He had gold chest plating, and silver plating where his stoma=
ch would be.  His kneecap plating was gold, and his upper and lower leg wer=
e silver.  His hands and feet were gold.  His arms were silver, his shoulde=
rs were gold.  His back was all silver.  His head was gold all around excep=
t for his face, which was silver.  

      "Yes!!  We've arrived!  We will =
create the music that the universe has longed to hear!!!  We will be known =
throught transformer history for many millenia to come!!!" Composer shouted=
 with glory in his voice.

       Then, he looked around.  He had been expe=
cting two other pods, containing his brothers Symphony and Orchestra.

    =
    "No!!  This can not be!!!  How will I, the great Composer, rise without=
 a Symphony and my Orchestra???" He shrieked, his voice changing to a panic=
y tone.

         Composer looked off in another direction where he noticed=
 some sort of base.

         "I must meet these transformers, who appear t=
o have been here for a long period of time.  Perhaps they know where Sympho=
ny and Orchestra went, or even maybe, just maybe, they could help me compos=
e the perfect melody!!!!!" He said, his voice raising to his cheery torn ag=
ain.

         He ran over to the Alliance base, and knocked on the hatch.
=

          "Please, let me join you!  I will create the finest music to sho=
w you my loyalty!!!" Composer shouted.

         Now he waited for a reply =
from these transformers whom he awaited to meet.

              ---In South=
west Africa, not far from the Maximal base---

           A sleek-looking p=
od landed on the ground.  It went sliding, but then came to a halt by the M=
aximal base.

            The pod opened up, releasing a tall, handsome bot=
.  This bot was blue and green all over except for red hands and feet.

   =
        "I have awoken!!!  Now, every transformer in the galaxy will listen=
 to the greatest Symphony in the universe!!!!  I, am Symphony, about to be =
played by the great Composer and the Orchestra!!!!!!" Symphony yelled out a=
s soon as he jumped out of his pod.

           "But what's this???  Where =
is the Composer and the Orchestra at this time of great musical ascension? =
 Without them, I will never be heard across the galaxy!!!" He said to himse=
lf, worried.

            Then, he looked at the Maximal base he had just l=
anded by.

             "If I cannot be composed by the great Composer and =
be played by the Orchestra, then perhaps these transformers have musical ta=
lent within them.  Perhaps these transformers will appreciate my great soun=
d," He said.

              To get the Maximal's attention, Symphony activa=
ted his com and sent music through to the Maximals.

         ----Right out=
side the hidden Pred base, in Greece----

          A transformer pod went =
shooting straight down to the Earth, and went right inside a volcano in Gre=
ece.  The pod smashed the ground very hard, making a large crater and alot =
of noise outside the Predacon base.  The pod suffered some damage, as did t=
he bot inside.  Inside was a transformer named Orchestra.  He hopped out of=
 the pod, rubbing his head.

          "Uggh.....might have....difficulties=
.....playing the....perfect.......Symphony......The Symphony!!  Where is th=
e Composer of the Symphony?  Without them, the universe will never hear the=
 music it was destined to!!  Wait a minute, what could this base be doing h=
ere?  Why have I landed in such a strange place?  If that's a base, then th=
ere must be transformers stationed here!  I might have a chance to play mus=
ic after all!!!" Orchestra said with joy, looking at the Preds' base.

    =
      "If you can hear me, let me in!  Please, allow me to demonstrate my m=
usic to you!  I can play any type of music in the universe!!" Orchestra yel=
led, hoping that he would be welcomed kindly.
